toto.inputs.nc¶

Read generic netcdf file This import function works well is NetCDF files created by XARRAY. This class returns a Panda Dataframe with some extra attributes such as Latitude,Longitude,Units.

Parameters¶

filename(files,) str or list_like

A list of filename to process.

Examples¶

>>> from toto.inputs.nc import NCfile
>>> nc=NCfile('filename.nc')._toDataFrame()
class toto.inputs.nc.NCfile(filenames)[source]¶
